name: PromptPro
summary: AI prompt engineering and agent-building platform that helps GTM teams master prompt design, build reusable AI workflows, and deploy AI agents for content, research, and automation tasks. Bridges the gap between knowing AI exists and operationalizing it across the GTM stack.
gtm_use_cases: Build reusable prompt templates for content briefs, competitor analysis, and keyword research workflows
Train GTM team members on prompt engineering to improve the quality and consistency of AI-generated content
Design and deploy AI agents that automate repetitive GTM tasks like content repurposing and SERP analysis

name: Claude
summary: Anthropic's AI assistant with strong reasoning, long-context support, and careful instruction-following. Suited for GTM workflows that require nuanced writing, analysis, and multi-step content creation.
gtm_use_cases: Generate detailed content briefs from keyword research data and competitor analysis
Draft and refine bottom-of-funnel comparison pages and feature narratives
Analyze large datasets of customer feedback to extract positioning insights

name: ChatGPT
summary: OpenAI's conversational AI with broad general knowledge, plugin ecosystem, and vision capabilities. Widely adopted for content ideation, drafting, and quick research tasks.
gtm_use_cases: Brainstorm content angles and headline variations for A/B testing
Summarize competitor pages and extract messaging patterns
Generate initial drafts for email sequences and nurture campaigns

name: Jasper
summary: AI content platform with brand voice controls, templates, and team collaboration features. Designed for marketing teams scaling content production with consistent tone and messaging.
gtm_use_cases: Scale blog and landing page production while maintaining brand voice consistency
Generate ad copy variations for paid search and social campaigns
Create localized content versions for multi-market GTM expansion

name: Writer
summary: Enterprise AI writing platform with style guides, terminology management, and content governance. Built for organizations that need AI content generation with compliance and brand guardrails.
gtm_use_cases: Enforce consistent product messaging across distributed content teams
Generate first drafts of technical content with approved terminology
Build repeatable content workflows with approval gates

name: Perplexity AI
summary: AI-powered research engine that provides sourced, cited answers. Useful for GTM teams doing competitive research, market analysis, and content fact-checking.
gtm_use_cases: Research competitor positioning and product features with source verification
Quickly compile market context and statistics for content briefs
Validate claims and data points before publishing GTM content

name: Frase
summary: AI-powered SEO content tool that combines SERP research, content brief generation, and AI writing in one workflow. Bridges the gap between keyword research and published content.
gtm_use_cases: Generate content briefs with SERP-derived outlines and questions to answer
Draft SEO-optimized articles with built-in optimization scoring
Analyze top-ranking content to identify gaps in existing pages

name: Copy.ai
summary: AI platform with workflow automation for go-to-market content. Includes pre-built workflows for prospecting, content creation, and sales enablement.
gtm_use_cases: Automate personalized outbound email generation from prospect data
Create product descriptions and feature pages at scale
Build AI workflows that turn product releases into multi-channel content

name: Grain
summary: AI-powered meeting recorder that captures, transcribes, and surfaces insights from sales and customer calls. Helps GTM teams close the loop between customer language and content strategy.
gtm_use_cases: Extract objections and feature requests from sales calls to inform content topics
Build a library of customer voice clips for messaging validation
Share deal context across sales, marketing, and product teams

name: Otter.ai
summary: AI meeting transcription and note-taking tool. Automatically transcribes meetings and generates summaries, making it easy to mine customer conversations for GTM insights.
gtm_use_cases: Transcribe customer interviews for messaging and positioning research
Generate meeting summaries for cross-functional GTM alignment
Search across call transcripts for recurring pain points and use cases

name: Midjourney
summary: AI image generation tool that creates high-quality visuals from text prompts. GTM teams use it for blog illustrations, social graphics, and presentation visuals without a design team.
gtm_use_cases: Create custom blog post illustrations that stand out in search results
Generate social media graphics for content distribution campaigns
Prototype visual concepts for landing pages and ad creative

name: Descript
summary: AI-powered video and audio editing platform that lets you edit media by editing text. Enables GTM teams to repurpose content across formats without specialized production skills.
gtm_use_cases: Repurpose webinar recordings into short-form social clips
Create product demo videos with AI voice and screen recording
Turn podcast episodes into blog posts and social content

name: Notion AI
summary: AI layer built into Notion's workspace that assists with writing, summarization, and data extraction. Useful for GTM teams already using Notion for content operations and planning.
gtm_use_cases: Summarize meeting notes and extract action items for GTM sprints
Draft content outlines and briefs within existing editorial workflows
Translate raw product documentation into customer-facing content

name: Lex
summary: AI-native writing editor with a minimal interface. Provides inline AI suggestions as you write, designed for long-form content like blog posts, thought leadership, and documentation.
gtm_use_cases: Draft long-form thought leadership content with AI-assisted flow
Overcome writer's block on founder-led narratives and positioning pieces
Write and iterate on product narratives with inline AI feedback

name: Zapier
summary: No-code automation platform connecting thousands of apps. Its AI features and natural language automation builder let GTM teams create content and data workflows without engineering support.
gtm_use_cases: Automate content distribution from CMS to social channels and email
Connect form submissions to CRM enrichment and lead scoring workflows
Build AI-powered content pipelines that trigger on specific events

name: n8n
summary: Open-source workflow automation platform with AI agent capabilities. Gives technical GTM teams full control over automation logic, data flows, and AI integrations.
gtm_use_cases: Build custom AI content pipelines with full control over prompts and logic
Create automated competitor monitoring and alerting workflows
Orchestrate multi-step GTM workflows combining APIs, AI, and databases
